description: To address the remote code execution issue identified by CVE-2023-36396, Microsoft has released a critical security update (KB5032190) effective November 14, 2023. This update is applicable to Windows 11 Version 23H2 and Version 22H2 for both x64-based and ARM64-based systems. The specific build numbers for the affected systems are 10.0.22621.2715. Administrators should apply the update using the package available at the following link: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190. Following the installation of this patch, it is recommended to restart the systems to ensure the update is fully integrated and operational. Regularly check for updates to maintain defenses against potential vulnerabilities and threats.
